Class DiagnosticCategory

java.lang.Object

public class DiagnosticCategory
extends Object

DiagnosticCategory - used for categorising Diagnostics.

Since:
Sanity4J 1.0
Author:
Yiannis Paschalidis

getDiagnosticCount

public int getDiagnosticCount(int severity)
Retrieves the total number of diagnostics for this category and all sub-categories, that have the given severity.

Parameters:

Returns:
the count of diagnostics
